japanese: 指示出しはらいはたちになったのか。
translation: So Raiha's gonna give directions with Itsuki?

japanese: お兄ちゃん、スイカ目指して頑張ろうね。
translation: Big bro, do your best to aim for the watermelon.

japanese:
あまり自信はありませんが、
私もスイカのために頑張ってみます。
translation:
I'm not very confident,
but I'll do my best for the watermelon's sake, too.

japanese:
はい、フー君。
目隠ししてあげるから動いちゃダメよ？
translation:
Okay, Fu-kun.
I'll put the blindfold on you, so don't move, okay?

japanese: お、おう。
translation: O-okay.

japanese:
それじゃ、始めるね！
よーい……スタート！
translation:
Alright, here we go!
Ready... START!

japanese:
（向いてる方向がわからんが、
　とりあえず真っ直ぐ進むか）
translation:
(I don't know which way I'm facing,
 so I'll just go straight.)

japanese:
上杉君！　ストップです！
今、方向を見てますから！
translation:
Uesugi-kun! Stop!
I'm watching where you're going, so please don't worry
about running into anything!

japanese: へっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
その場で、ゆっくりと右に体を回してください。
正しい方向を向きましたら教えます！
translation:
Right where you are, slowly turn to the right.
I'll let you know when you're
pointing in the right direction!

japanese: こ、こうか？
translation: L-like this?

japanese:
ストップです！
スイカを正面に捉えました！
そのまま真っすぐに進んでください！
translation:
Stop!
The watermelon is RIGHT in front of you!
Just go straight ahead!

japanese: おう……行くぞ？
translation: Okay... I'm going, then?

japanese: 上杉君！　ストップです！
translation: Uesugi-kun! Stop!

japanese: は？　またか？
translation: Huh? Again?

japanese:
今の踏み出しで右に３センチ……
いえ、５センチほど正面からズレました！
修正しましょう！
translation:
The step you just took is about an inch...
No, two inches too far to the right!
We've got to fix your bearings!

japanese:
細かすぎる！
スイカを割る前に日が暮れるぞ！？
translation:
That's WAY too detailed!
The sun's gonna set before I split the watermelon!

japanese:
えっ！？　それは困ります！
早くなんとかしてください！
translation:
Huh?! That won't do!
Please find a way to fix this!

japanese: なんとかするのはお前らの役目だろ！？
translation: That's YOUR responsibility, right?!

japanese: そ、それもそうでした！
translation: O-oh, that's true!

japanese: あはは！　２人とも頑張ってー！
translation: Ahaha! Do your best, you two!

japanese:
らいは……。
笑ってないで、なんとかしてくれ。
translation:
Raiha...
Stop laughing, and help us out.

japanese:
すみません、らいはちゃん。
私では難しそうなので、お願いできますか？
translation:
Sorry, Raiha-chan.
This is a bit tough for me. Can you help?

japanese:
仕方ないなー。
お兄ちゃん、そのまま進んじゃっていいよー！
translation:
I suppoooose.
Big bro, keep going just like that!

japanese: わかった。
translation: Got it.

japanese:
ああああ、そんな適当に進んだら……
ほら、違う方向に行ってますよ！？
translation:
Aaahh, don't go forward so casually...
Hey, you're going in the wrong direction!

japanese:
大丈夫大丈夫。
お兄ちゃん、右にちょっとジャンプ！
translation:
It's fine, it's fine.
Big bro, jump a little to the right!

japanese: よっ！　こんなもんか？
translation: There! Like this?

japanese:
えええ……。
どうしてそんなにうまくいくのですか……。
translation:
Huhhh...?
Why is everything going so well...?

japanese:
うんうん。
あと４歩進んだら叩いちゃっていいよー！
translation:
Good, good.
Four more steps, and you can swing!

japanese: う、上杉君！　頑張ってください！
translation: U-Uesugi-kun! Please do your best!
One, two, three, four...and SWING!

japanese: ふう、当たったか。
translation: Whew, did I hit it?

japanese: やったね、お兄ちゃん！
translation: Great job, big bro!

japanese:
２人とも、お見事です！
あうんの呼吸というのはこのことを言うのですね。
translation:
Both of you were amazing!
So this is what being in perfect harmony is.

japanese:
お？　見た目はそれっぽくなかったが、
これは間違いなくスイカだな。
translation:
Oh? It didn't really look like one,
but this is definitely a watermelon.

japanese:
中身も傷んでないし匂いも変じゃないね。
食べられそう。
translation:
The insides aren't damaged, and it doesn't smell weird.
I think it's edible.

japanese: 俺も大丈夫だと思うが……五月はどう思う？
translation:
I think it's okay too... What do you think,
Itsuki?

japanese:
あ、はい。
そうですね、見た感じは――
translation:
Ah, yes.
Well, it looks%p-2;――

japanese:
――！
い、今のは忘れてください！
translation:
%p-2;――%p;!
N-no, forget what I just said!

japanese:
仕方がないよ。
美味しそうだもんね。
お兄ちゃん、このスイカ食べちゃダメかな？
translation:
I can't help myself.
It looks so delicious!
Big bro, can't we eat this watermelon?

japanese:
問題はなさそうだし食べておくか。
食べ物は粗末にしたらダメだからな。
translation:
Doesn't seem to be any problem, so let's eat it.
Since it's not right to waste food.

japanese:
私はなんの力にもなれませんでしたから、
遠慮しておきます。
translation: I wasn't any help at all, so I'm going to pass.

japanese:
変な意地を張るなよ。
本当は食いたいんだろ？
translation:
Oh, don't be so stubborn.
You really just wanna eat it, right?

japanese: 意地など張っていません！
translation: I'm not being stubborn!

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、そんな言い方したら
五月さんもますます食べづらくなっちゃうよ？
translation:
Big bro, when you say things like that,
it'll be even harder for Itsuki-san to eat it, you know?

japanese: そうなのか？
translation: Really?

japanese: 私は五月さんと一緒に食べたいなぁ。
translation: I want to eat this watermelon with you, Itsuki-san.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
ほら、らいはもこう言ってるんだ。
一緒に食おうぜ。
translation:
Look, even Raiha's saying it.
Let's eat it together.

japanese:
らいはちゃんにそう言われては……
仕方がありませんね。
translation:
If Raiha-chan says to...
I suppose I have no choice.

japanese: これは遊びなんだし、難しく考えるな。
translation: We're just playing. Don't be so hard on yourself.

japanese: ですが……。
translation: But...

japanese:
俺が気にしてないって言ってるんだぞ。
それに、なにより楽しかったからな。
translation:
I'm saying I don't mind at all.
And most of all, it was fun.

japanese: 楽しかった……ですか？
translation: It was...fun?

japanese: ああ、特にお前の指示のめちゃくちゃぶりが。
translation: Yeah, especially with your confusing directions.

japanese: め、めちゃくちゃ……。
translation: C-confusing directions...

japanese:
うん、めちゃくちゃだけど面白かったよ！
五月さんらしいなって。
translation:
Yes, they were a bit confusing,
but they were so fun!
It's just so you, Itsuki-san.

japanese: だな、実にお前らしかったぜ。
translation: For sure. It was totally a you thing.

japanese: ふふ、褒めてもらったと思うことにします。
translation: Heheh, then I suppose I'll take that as a compliment.

japanese: 俺をもてなすんだろ？
translation: Aren't you gonna indulge me?

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
この島に来た理由だよ。
お前たちが言い出したことじゃないか。
translation:
That's why I came to this island.
Isn't that what you all told me?

japanese:
俺はここでお前とスイカを食いたい。
それはダメなのか？
translation:
I want to eat a watermelon here with you.
Is that so wrong?

japanese: ダメ……ではありませんが……。
translation: It's...not wrong, but...

japanese:
３人で苦労して割ったスイカだからな。
みんなで一緒に食おうぜ、きっと美味いぞ。
translation:
It's a watermelon that the three of us
took the trouble to break open.
Let's eat it together. It's gonna be delicious.

japanese: そこまで言われたら……断れないじゃないですか。
translation: If you say that...how can I refuse?

japanese:
おー、美味しそうなスイカだね。
さっそく食べよっか。
translation:
Ooh, it looks so delicious!
Let's eat it right now!

japanese: 切り分けるのは任せてください！
translation: I'll divide it up!

japanese: ああ、頼む。
translation: Sure, I'll leave it up to you.

japanese:
髪、結び終わったな。
んじゃ、食うとするか。
translation:
You've finished tying your hair up.
Alright, let's chow down.

japanese:
（五月が髪を結んだのは、食べるのに邪魔だからか。
　そこまで気合いを入れて食うのかと
　若干引いてしまったが、さすがに違ったな）
translation:
(Itsuki tied her hair back because it got in the way.
 I see now. I thought it was it because she was just
 that excited to eat.)

japanese:
はい、五月さん。
冷えてるうちに食べよ。
translation:
Okay, Itsuki-san.
Eat it while it's still cold.

japanese: では、お言葉に甘えて――
translation: Alright, if you say so%p-2;――

japanese: いただきます！
translation: Let's eat!

japanese: はっ！？　これは――
translation: WHA?! This is%p-2;――

japanese:
どうした？
まさか傷んで――
translation:
What's wrong?
Oh no, don't tell me it got bruised%p-2;――

japanese:
まごうことなきスイカです！
甘くて美味しいスイカですよ！！
translation:
This is definitely a watermelon!
It's so sweet and delicious, too!!

japanese: うん！　とっても美味しい！
translation: Yum! It's so good!

japanese: ……驚かせるな。
translation: ...Don't surprise me like that.

japanese:
ああ……。
瑞々しい甘さが体中に染み渡ります。
translation:
Oh my goodness...
The fresh sweetness is permeating my entire body.

japanese:
こんなにも美味しく感じるのは、
夏の浜辺という最高の調味料のおかげでしょうか？
translation:
Could the summer beach be the perfect seasoning 
to make it taste this delicious?

japanese: 日差しも強いし、体が水分を欲してたんだろ。
translation:
It's 'cause the sun's strong,
and your body craves water.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、わかってないなぁ。
一緒に楽しく食べるから美味しいんだよ。
translation:
You don't get it, do you, big bro.
It's because we're having fun eating it together
that makes it so delicious.

japanese:
夏の味覚を夏に味わう……。
幸せですね……。
translation:
To eat a summer food, during summer...
I'm so happy...

japanese:
（まあ……こいつの顔を見れば、
　らいはの言うこともわからなくはないか）
translation:
(Well...looking at Itsuki,
 I can kind of get what Raiha's saying.)

japanese:
ほら、らいは。
五月と一緒に俺の分も食べていいぞ。
translation:
Go on, Raiha.
You can eat my portion with Itsuki.

japanese: やったー！
translation: Yaaay!

japanese: いいのですか？
translation: Is it really okay?

japanese:
あっ、いえ！
上杉君の分まで頂くわけにはいきません。
translation:
Ah, no!
I can't take your share, Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
俺は、お前とらいはが
食べてるのを見てるだけで充分だ。
だから遠慮しないで食っとけ。
translation:
I'm happy enough just watching you and Raiha eat it.
Go ahead and chow down!

japanese:
だって！
一緒にお兄ちゃんの分を食べちゃおう！
translation:
Hey, he said it!
Come on, let's eat big bro's watermelon!

japanese:
……らいはちゃんの勧めでは、
断るわけにはいきませんよね？
translation: ...I can't really refuse if you insist, Raiha-chan.

japanese:
ああ、当然だ。
断ったらただじゃおかねぇ。
translation:
Yeah, naturally.
Refuse Raiha, and you'll pay the price.

japanese: では仕方がありません。
translation: I really am powerless, here.

japanese: それじゃ――
translation: In that case%p-2;――

japanese: いただきまーす！
translation: Leeet's eeaat!

japanese: んー、やはり美味しいです！
translation: Mmm, this is just so good!

japanese:
五月さんを見てると
ますます美味しく感じちゃうなー。
translation:
Watching you, Itsuki-san,
makes it even more delicious.

japanese:
ありがとうございます！
らいはちゃんの笑顔も最高の調味料ですよ！
translation:
Thank you so much!
Your smile is the perfect seasoning too, Raiha-chan!

japanese:
（本当に嬉しそうに食べやがって。
　まあ、俺の分を譲ったかいがあったな）
translation:
(They look so happy eating it.
 I guess giving them my share was totally worth it.)
